name: Harry
text: An absolutely unbelievable hotel, the best I have ever stayed in. The staff were so warm and welcoming, the room was amazing, the building was stunning with lots of amazing foliage and birds singing all day… you must stay here if you go to Marrakech. It’s the perfect combo between a old Moroccan style with modern comforts

name: Sakina
text: very cozy place and relaxing. we loved the evening atmosphere in the garden with the live oud musician. was perfect! the staff was very welcoming and helpful; the service was very professional and superb.

name: Hannah
text: Everything! The rooms, the pool, the food, the people - all excellent. It’s a gorgeous hotel. Fatima and Sumaya were particularly hospitable ☺️

name: Woolsey
text: I’ve stayed in many hotels across America and Europe but this was excellent the staff couldn’t do enough for you. Food was excellent also, after spending time in the centre and climbing MT Toubkal this was just what I needed

name: Karolien
text: Beautiful architecture, amazing service, very comfortable bed and delicious food.

name: Rui
text: It was amazing, the people the facilities all was perfect. I recommend this to all the exigent people. They are so nice that you will love it.

name: Marcel
text: Beautiful place, really enjoyed. The staff was really nice.

name: Yassine
text: The property is amazing, The stuff is very kind & the location is perfect, it’s clear that the management team has the knowledge of the business. Everyting was AWESOME we are so happy to end our vacation in this place.

name: David
text: Everything! The setting was stunning. The staff were the very best & nothing was too much trouble. Cleanliness was 100% Food was fabulous, we will be back for sure.
